Module it.polimi.ingsw.am45
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am45.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am45.model.Game
public class Game extends Object
Game is the class that represents the game itself. It contains all the information about the game and is the main class that manages the game. It contains the players, the decks, the current turn, the game status and

    • addPlayer

      Adds a player to the game
      Parameters:
      player - The player to be added.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Method to start the game with the initialization of the hands for each player, the Market and the turns of the players.

    • disconnectPlayer

      public void disconnectPlayer(Player player)
      Disconnects a player from the current game and deletes the game if it is empty.
      Parameters:
      player - The player associated with the game to be disconnected.

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      Method to switch the turn to the next player.

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Method to calculate all the points from the public and personal objective card after the last turn. It also declares the winner.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Returns:
      The current playing player.

    • setTurns

      public void setTurns()
      Method to set the turns of the players in the game and send the information to the players.

    • isStarted

      public boolean isStarted()
      Returns:
      boolean value if the game is started or not.

    • getPlayerByNickname

      public Player getPlayerByNickname(String nickname) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player to be found.
      Returns:
      The player with the given nickname or null if the player is not found.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • isReadyToStart

      public boolean isReadyToStart()
      Method to check if the game has the desired number of players chose by the first player.
      Returns:
      boolean value if the number of players is equal to the maximum number of players.

    • getPlayerNicknames

      public Stack<String> getPlayerNicknames()
      Returns:
      a stack with the nicknames of the players in the game, in the order of their turns.

    • getHandsCardsFromPlayer

      public List<String> getHandsCardsFromPlayer(Player player)
      Parameters:
      player - The player to get the Hand cards from.
      Returns:
      The list of the cards in the player's Hand.

    • setMarket

      public void setMarket()
      set the Market cards for the game: adding the cards to the Market.

    • containsNickname

      public boolean containsNickname(String nick)
      Parameters:
      nick - The nickname of the player to be checked.
      Returns:
      boolean value if the player is in the game or not.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      boolean value if the color is being used or not

    • playCard

      public boolean playCard(int position, Location location, String nick)
      The method to play a card from the player's hand to the game board in the given location-
      Parameters:
      position - The position of the card in the player's hand to be played.
      location - The location where the card is played.
      nick - The nickname of the player that played the card.
      Returns:
      boolean value if the card was played or not.
